her geçen gün oyun zevki azalıyor.

игра нормальная, но читеров очень много...

Bu oyunu yapan ekibin allah canlarının yarısını alsın! Kanser etti beni kanser sinir hastası etti. Dünyada ne kadar Oç (Ortam Çocuğu) varmış onu gösterdi. Ne kadar Beyinsiz, Kulaksız, Aklı ve Fikri Hür olmayan insan varsa bu oyunda toplanmış. Burdan Bu kişiliklerdeki herkese şunu söylüyorum. Allah Hepinizin canını alsın inşallah. Cehennem varsa orda hepinizin götüne elektirik direği sokup sokup çıkartırlar inşallah!!!
Tak mnie wkurwia, a nadal ją kocham
Jogo muito bom,só tem muito hacker.
класс игра ток читеров много а так лайк
Классная,тактичная игра,играю более 5 лет в нее,очень бесит ,когда постоянно жалуются друг на друга игроки,что они используют постороннее ПО.

Each time you matchmake, it's basically the luck of the draw whether you'll play against hackers, smurfs, or people ranked way higher than you. This is why so many people say it's almost impossible to get out of Silver rating in 2020.

It's a fun game when the matchmaking works, but when the aforementioned happens it just kills any excitement I have in this game.

My friend group had all the spray patterns down, knew all the perfect grenade spots, could make nasty flick shots, we could do pretty well against Gold Novas despite being in Silver. We'd win 5 matches in a row, rank up, then lose 1 match because of a blatant cheater on the other team with a 20-1 KDR and derank, do the process all over again.
If you are going to play with a cheaters, download.

Mas não jogue sozinho ou só em dupla MM, vai só se estressar. 
Faça como todo game, jogue pela diversão! A menos que queira virar pro player, mas caso não seja esse o objetivo e você não consiga carregar o time sozinho? Então, jogue tranquilo e se divirta!

I've tried this game out "a bit" as you can see. Totally not a bad investment of my time, almost 3,5k hours and still forget to aim for the head. Would recommend to my whole family! GL HF :D

Its a great game worth the download. But at first it will become troubling to make frags. CSGO is one of those games where it takes time to build up skill and muscle memory. Which then it can be actually fun and very competitive at times. The skins in the game are really fantastic gives the bland stock weapons a different look. Overall 10/10 :) btw the player base is toxic but also funny
